bibl.title: Ἄνθρωπος in Papyri of the Byzantine Period.
bibl.note: Presents a word attested on Byzantine papyri as a designation for slaves, that is the word ἄνθρωπος, and its broader implications and connotations.
bibl.seg: SARISCHOULI Panagiota, Ἄνθρωπος in Papyri of the Byzantine Period (late 3rd-mid 7th. c.).
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 889-901.
Presents a word attested on Byzantine papyri as a designation for slaves, that is the word ἄνθρωπος, and its broader implications and connotations.
